sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT ''Supply'' AS ''EventType''
	  ,''ADF_ManualRefresh'' AS ''EventName''
	  ,''R'' AS ''EventStatus''
	  ,GETDATE() AS ''CreateDateTime''
	  ,''',pipeline().parameters.Refresh,''' AS ''EventParameters''
	  ,''',string(variables('Response')[0].refreshid),''' AS ''RefreshId''')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TOP 10 [EventId],[RefreshId] FROM [Controls].[AzureSharedEventQueue]
WHERE [EventType] = 'Supply' AND [EventStatus] = 'R'
ORDER BY [EventId]

SELECT [EventType]
	  ,[ModelName]
	  ,[EventName]
	  ,[RefreshId]
	  ,(GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time') AS 'CreateDateTime'
FROM 
(
VALUES ('PBI Refresh','Canvas','Nightly_Begin',NULL) 
	  ,('PBI Refresh','Canvas','Nightly_Dimensions','815210b8-e644-4b91-a326-115b1344d7e7') 
	  ,('PBI Refresh','Canvas','Nightly_Facts','e5847484-b8b3-408d-ada6-b2d59c53b6ee') 
	  ,('PBI Refresh','Canvas','Facts_Partitions','a4e27111-c905-4143-8ec7-d4540cc99856') 
	--  ,('PBI Refresh','Canvas','Nightly_End',NULL) 
) AS CR (EventType,ModelName,EventName,RefreshId)

SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (
	SELECT * FROM [Controls].[ADFRefreshQueue]
	WHERE [ModelName] = 'Canvas'
	  AND [EventType] = 'PBI Refresh'
	  AND ([EventStatus] = 'R' OR [EventStatus] IS NULL)
)
THEN 0
ELSE 1 END AS 'Idle'

@concat('SELECT ',activity('GetRefreshId').output.firstRow.EventId,' AS ''EventId''
	  ,''',variables('Message'),''' AS ''EventStatusMessage''')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (
	SELECT [EventId]
      ,[ModelName]
      ,[EventName]
      ,[RefreshId]
      ,[EventStatus]
	FROM [AZUREDB].[DB01].[Controls].[ADFRefreshQueue] EQ
	INNER JOIN [Dimensions].[Days] DT ON [DT].[ActualDate] = CAST([EQ].[CreateDateTime] AS date)
	WHERE [EQ].[EventName] = 'Nightly_End'
	  AND [EQ].[EventStatus] = 'C'
	  AND [EQ].[ModelName] = 'Orders'
	  AND [DT].[CurrentDayOffset] = 0
)
THEN 1
ELSE 0 END AS 'OrdersNightlyRun'

SELECT COUNT([EventId]) AS 'CompletedDatasets'
FROM (
	SELECT MAX([EventId]) AS 'EventId'
		,[ModelName]
		,[EventName]
		,[EventStatus]
	FROM [AZUREDB].[DB01].[Controls].[ADFRefreshQueue] EQ
	INNER JOIN [Dimensions].[Days] DT ON [DT].[ActualDate] = CAST([EQ].[CreateDateTime] AS date)
	WHERE [EQ].[EventName] = 'Nightly_End'
		AND [EQ].[EventStatus] = 'C'
		AND [EQ].[ModelName] IN ('Orders','Supply','Warehouse')
		AND [DT].[CurrentDayOffset] = 0
	GROUP BY [ModelName],[EventName],[EventStatus]
) DTE

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT ''PBI Refresh'' AS ''EventType''
	  ,''Orders'' AS ''ModelName''
	  ,''DashboardsReadyEmail'' AS ''EventName''
	  ,''C'' AS ''EventStatus''
	  ,NULL AS ''RefreshId''
	  ,''',activity('StartTime').output.firstRow.TimeNow,''' AS ''CreateDateTime''
	  ,''',activity('StartTime').output.firstRow.TimeNow,''' AS ''ProcessStart''
	  ,''',convertFromUtc(utcnow(),'Eastern Standard Time'),''' AS ''ProcessEnd''
	  ,NULL AS ''RequestID''
	  ,''',pipeline().RunId,''' AS ''PipelineRunID''')

SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (
	SELECT * FROM [Controls].[ADFRefreshQueue]
	WHERE EventName IN ('DashboardsReadyEmail')
	  AND [ModelName] = 'Orders'
	  AND [EventStatus] IN ('C')
	  AND CAST([CreateDateTime] AS date) = CAST(GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time' AS date)
)
THEN 1
ELSE 0 END AS 'DashboardsReadyEmail'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT ''PBI Refresh'' AS ''EventType''
	  ,''Orders'' AS ''ModelName''
	  ,''DashboardsPendingEmail'' AS ''EventName''
	  ,''C'' AS ''EventStatus''
	  ,NULL AS ''RefreshId''
	  ,''',activity('StartTime').output.firstRow.TimeNow,''' AS ''CreateDateTime''
	  ,''',activity('StartTime').output.firstRow.TimeNow,''' AS ''ProcessStart''
	  ,''',convertFromUtc(utcnow(),'Eastern Standard Time'),''' AS ''ProcessEnd''
	  ,NULL AS ''RequestID''
	  ,''',pipeline().RunId,''' AS ''PipelineRunID''')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT COALESCE(SUBSTRING(
        (
           SELECT DISTINCT ', ' + [M1].[ModelName]
			FROM
				(
					VALUES 
					 ('Orders',1)
					,('Supply',2)
					--,('MasterData',4)
					,('Warehouse',3)
				) AS M1(ModelName, PriorityNumber)
			LEFT JOIN [AZUREDB].[DB01].[Controls].[ADFRefreshQueue] EQ ON [EQ].[ModelName] = [M1].[ModelName] AND [EQ].[EventName] = 'Nightly_End'
			AND CAST([EQ].[CreateDateTime] AS date) = (SELECT [ActualDate] FROM [Dimensions].[Days] WHERE [CurrentDayOffset] = 0)
			AND [EQ].[EventName] = 'Nightly_End'
			AND [EQ].[EventStatus] = 'C'
			AND [EQ].[ModelName] IN ('Orders','Supply','Warehouse')
			WHERE [EQ].[ModelName] IS NULL
            FOR XML PATH (''), TYPE
        ).value('text()[1]','nvarchar(max)'), 2, 1000),'') AS 'Models'

SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (
	SELECT * FROM [Controls].[ADFRefreshQueue]
	WHERE EventName = 'DashboardsPendingEmail'
	  AND [ModelName] = 'Orders'
	  AND [EventStatus] IN ('C')
	  AND CAST([CreateDateTime] AS date) = CAST(GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time' AS date)
)
THEN 1
ELSE 0 END AS 'DashboardsPendingEmail'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT ''PBI Refresh'' AS ''EventType''
	  ,''Orders'' AS ''ModelName''
	  ,''DashboardsReadyEmail'' AS ''EventName''
	  ,''C'' AS ''EventStatus''
	  ,NULL AS ''RefreshId''
	  ,''',activity('StartTime').output.firstRow.TimeNow,''' AS ''CreateDateTime''
	  ,''',activity('StartTime').output.firstRow.TimeNow,''' AS ''ProcessStart''
	  ,''',convertFromUtc(utcnow(),'Eastern Standard Time'),''' AS ''ProcessEnd''
	  ,NULL AS ''RequestID''
	  ,''',pipeline().RunId,''' AS ''PipelineRunID''')

@concat('SELECT ',variables('RefreshId'),' AS ''EventId''
	  ,''',variables('Messages'),''' AS ''EventStatusMessage''')

activities.name: CheckForHourly
activities.description: Query to return TRUE if the first hourly in Orders is Complete.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (
	SELECT [SL].[SupportLogNumber],[SL].[PackageStatus],[SL].[EndOfProcess],[EQ].*
	FROM [Controls].[SupportLogs] SL
	INNER JOIN [Dimensions].[Days] DT ON [DT].[ActualDate] = CAST([EndOfProcess] AS date)
	INNER JOIN [AZUREDB].[DB01].[Controls].[ADFRefreshQueue] EQ ON [EQ].[CreateDateTime] > [SL].[EndOfProcess]
															   AND [EQ].[EventName] = 'Hourly'
															   AND [EQ].[ModelName] = 'Orders'
															   AND [EQ].[EventStatus] = 'C'
	WHERE [SL].[ChildPackageName] = 'ImportShopperTrakTraffic'
	  AND [SL].[PackageStatus] = 'C'
	  AND [DT].[CurrentDayOffset] = 0
)
THEN 1
ELSE 0 END AS 'HourlyRun'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT ''PBI Refresh'' AS ''EventType''
	  ,''Orders'' AS ''ModelName''
	  ,''D2CDashboardsReady'' AS ''EventName''
	  ,''C'' AS ''EventStatus''
	  ,NULL AS ''RefreshId''
	  ,''',activity('StartTime').output.firstRow.TimeNow,''' AS ''CreateDateTime''
	  ,''',activity('StartTime').output.firstRow.TimeNow,''' AS ''ProcessStart''
	  ,''',convertFromUtc(utcnow(),'Eastern Standard Time'),''' AS ''ProcessEnd''
	  ,NULL AS ''RequestID''
	  ,''',pipeline().RunId,''' AS ''PipelineRunID''')

source.sqlReaderQuery:

	SELECT [SL].[SupportLogNumber],[SL].[PackageStatus],[SL].[EndOfProcess]
	FROM [Controls].[SupportLogs] SL
	INNER JOIN [Dimensions].[Days] DT ON [DT].[ActualDate] = CAST([EndOfProcess] AS date)
	WHERE [SL].[ChildPackageName] = 'ImportShopperTrakTraffic'
	  AND [SL].[PackageStatus] = 'C'
	  AND [DT].[CurrentDayOffset] = 0)
THEN 1
ELSE 0 END AS 'ShopperTrakTraffic'

	  AND CAST([CreateDateTime] AS date) = CAST(GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time' AS date)
)
THEN 1

SELECT GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time' AS 'TimeNow'

source.query:
SELECT IDCASN
	  ,IDSEA
	  ,IDSTYL
	  ,IDCOLR
	  ,IDSDIM
	  ,IDSZCD
	  ,IDSZPO
	  ,IDINVT
	  ,IDBCHN
	  ,IDSZDS
	  ,IDQTY
	  ,IDSQTY
	  ,IDWKON
	  ,IDSHMT
	  ,IDPON
	  ,IDTRLN
	  ,IDSTAT
	  ,IDWHSE
	  ,IDAREA
	  ,IDZONE
	  ,IDAISL
	  ,IDBAY
	  ,IDLEVL
	  ,IDPOSN
	  ,IDPAID
	  ,IDPXR3
	  ,IDDCR
	  ,IDTCR
	  ,IDUSER
FROM WM350PLTBD.IDCASE00
WHERE IDDCR >= 20220101

SELECT PRORDER
	  ,PRADJORG
	  ,PRPLTCTY
	  ,PRDTCR
	  ,PRTMCR
FROM WM350PLTCD.PRPROD00
WHERE PRDTCR >= 20220101

SELECT DDWHSE
	  ,DDWKON
	  ,DDSEA
	  ,DDSTYL
	  ,DDCOLR
	  ,DDSDIM
	  ,DDSZCD
	  ,DDSZPO
	  ,DDSZDS
	  ,DDINVT
	  ,DDBORQ
	  ,DDDCR
FROM WM350PLTBD.DDDCOR00
WHERE DDDCR >= 20220101
AND DDINVT = 'F'
AND DDSDIM <> '   '

SELECT *
FROM WM350PLTCD.C801E0WP
WHERE W2DCR >= 20220101
AND W2CASN IS NOT NULL
AND W2CASN <> ''
AND W2CASN <> '                    '
AND W2STAT <> '99'

SELECT W2SHMT
	  ,W2SEA1
	  ,W2SEA2
	  ,W2SEA3
	  ,W2SEA4
	  ,W2SEA5
FROM WM350PLTCD.C801E0WP
WHERE W2DLM >= 20220101
AND W2CASN = '                    '

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time' AS 'TimeNow'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT [EventType]
	  ,[ModelName]
	  ,[EventName]
	  ,[RefreshId]
	  ,''',activity('StartTime').output.firstRow.TimeNow,''' AS ''CreateDateTime''
	  ,[EventStatus]
	  ,[ProcessEnd]
	  ,NULL AS ''RequestID''
	  ,''',pipeline().RunId,''' AS ''PipelineRunID''
FROM 
(
VALUES (''PBI Refresh'',''Plants'',''Nightly_Begin'',NULL,''C'',''',convertFromUtc(utcnow(),'Eastern Standard Time'),''') 
	  ,(''PBI Refresh'',''Plants'',''Nightly_Dimensions'',''15037fbd-2574-4243-807e-5e526b980169'',''C'',''',convertFromUtc(utcnow(),'Eastern Standard Time'),''') 
	  ,(''PBI Refresh'',''Plants'',''Nightly_Facts'',''cd7bc036-2814-4ded-a049-94fdde2fe347'',''C'',''',convertFromUtc(utcnow(),'Eastern Standard Time'),''')
	  ,(''PBI Refresh'',''Plants'',''Nightly_End'',NULL,''C'',''',convertFromUtc(utcnow(),'Eastern Standard Time'),''') 
) AS PR (EventType,ModelName,EventName,RefreshId,EventStatus,ProcessEnd)')

	  ,DDSEA
	  ,DDSTYL
	  ,DDCOLR
	  ,DDSDIM
	  ,DDSZCD
	  ,DDSZPO
	  ,DDSZDS

	  ,DDBORQ
	  ,DDDCR

WHERE DDDCR >= ',activity('ProcessDate').output.firstRow.StartDate,'
AND DDINVT = ''F''
AND DDSDIM <> ''   ''')

	  ,''Plants'' AS ''ModelName''

	  ,''3167dd37-7c14-4c39-af0d-ae13c90c727e'' AS ''RefreshId''

	  ,''C'' AS ''EventStatus''
	  ,''',convertFromUtc(formatDateTime(activity('RefreshFacts').output.endTime, 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffffffZ'),'Eastern Standard Time'),''' AS ''ProcessEnd''

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT CAST(CONVERT(varchar(8),GETDATE()-7 AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time' ,112) AS int) AS 'StartDate'

SELECT [EventType]
	  ,[ModelName]
	  ,[EventName]
	  ,[RefreshId]
	  ,(GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time') AS 'CreateDateTime'
FROM 
(
VALUES ('PBI Refresh','Warehouse','Nightly_Begin',NULL) 
	  ,('PBI Refresh','Warehouse','Nightly_Dimensions','e91a7779-d666-4c42-8948-37335a93cc69') 
	  ,('PBI Refresh','Warehouse','Nightly_Facts','1dea953e-721c-4976-a44b-8383e8cf00fe') 
	  ,('PBI Refresh','Warehouse','Facts_Partitions','4eb9fcad-36c9-4d35-a783-27d3ae25a098') 
	  ,('PBI Refresh','Warehouse','Nightly_End',NULL) 
) AS CR (EventType,ModelName,EventName,RefreshId)

SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (
	SELECT * FROM [Controls].[ADFRefreshQueue]
	WHERE [ModelName] = 'Warehouse'
		AND [EventType] = 'PBI Refresh'
		AND ([EventStatus] = 'R' OR [EventStatus] IS NULL)
)
THEN 0
ELSE 1 END AS 'Idle'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT CAST(
(
	SELECT TRIM([Tablename]) AS ''table''
	FROM [Controls].[ADFEventRefreshCatalog]
		WHERE [EventName] = ''',activity('ReadRefresh').output.firstRow.EventName,'''
		AND [ModelName] = ''Warehouse''
		AND [ValidFlag] = ''Y''
	FOR JSON AUTO
) AS varchar(MAX)) AS ''Refresh''')

@concat('SELECT CAST(
(
	SELECT TRIM([Tablename]) AS ''table''
	FROM [Controls].[ADFEventRefreshCatalog]
		WHERE [EventName] = ''',activity('ReadRefresh').output.firstRow.EventName,'''
		AND [ModelName] = ''Warehouse''
		AND [ValidFlag] = ''Y''
	FOR JSON AUTO
) AS varchar(MAX)) AS ''Refresh''')

@concat('SELECT CAST(
(
	SELECT [table]
		  ,[partition]
	FROM [Controls].[WarehousePartitionsNightly]
	FOR JSON AUTO
) AS varchar(MAX)) AS ''Refresh''')

@concat('SELECT CAST(
(
	SELECT TRIM([Tablename]) AS ''table''
	FROM [Controls].[ADFEventRefreshCatalog]
		WHERE [EventName] = ''',activity('ReadRefresh').output.firstRow.EventName,'''
		AND [ModelName] = ''Supply''
		AND [ValidFlag] = ''Y''
	FOR JSON AUTO
) AS varchar(MAX)) AS ''Refresh''')

@concat('SELECT CAST(
(
	SELECT [table]
		  ,[partition]
	FROM [CarharttDw].[Controls].[WarehousePartitionsHourly]
	FOR JSON AUTO
) AS varchar(MAX)) AS ''Refresh''')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [EventId],[EventName] FROM [Controls].[ADFRefreshQueue]
WHERE [ModelName] = 'Warehouse'
	  AND [EventType] = 'PBI Refresh'
	  AND [EventStatus] IS NULL
ORDER BY [EventId]

SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (
	SELECT * FROM [Controls].[ADFRefreshQueue]
	WHERE [ModelName] = 'Warehouse'
	  AND [EventType] = 'PBI Refresh'
	  AND [EventStatus] = 'R'
)
THEN 1
ELSE 0 END AS 'Running'

SELECT [EventId],[RequestId],[EventName],[PipelineRunID],[ModelName] FROM [Controls].[ADFRefreshQueue]
WHERE [EventType] = 'PBI Refresh' AND [ModelName] = 'Warehouse' AND [EventStatus] = 'R'
ORDER BY EventId

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT ',activity('GetRefreshId').output.firstRow.EventId,' AS ''EventId''
	  ,''',variables('Message'),''' AS ''EventStatusMessage''')

@concat('SELECT ''PBI Refresh'' AS ''EventType''
	  ,''Orders'' AS ''ModelName''
	  ,''DashboardsPendingEmail'' AS ''EventName''
	  ,''C'' AS ''EventStatus''
	  ,NULL AS ''RefreshId''
	  ,''',activity('StartTime').output.firstRow.TimeNow,''' AS ''CreateDateTime''
	  ,''',activity('StartTime').output.firstRow.TimeNow,''' AS ''ProcessStart''
	  ,''',convertFromUtc(utcnow(),'Eastern Standard Time'),''' AS ''ProcessEnd''
	  ,NULL AS ''RequestID''
	  ,''',pipeline().RunId,''' AS ''PipelineRunID''')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT COALESCE(SUBSTRING(
        (
           SELECT DISTINCT ', ' + [M1].[ModelName]
			FROM
				(
					VALUES 
					 ('Orders',1)
					,('Supply',2)
					,('MasterData',4)
					,('Warehouse',3)
				) AS M1(ModelName, PriorityNumber)
			LEFT JOIN [AZUREDB].[DB01].[Controls].[ADFRefreshQueue] EQ ON [EQ].[ModelName] = [M1].[ModelName] AND [EQ].[EventName] = 'Nightly_End'
			AND CAST([EQ].[CreateDateTime] AS date) = (SELECT [ActualDate] FROM [Dimensions].[Days] WHERE [CurrentDayOffset] = 0)
			AND [EQ].[EventName] = 'Nightly_End'
			AND [EQ].[EventStatus] = 'C'
			AND [EQ].[ModelName] IN ('Orders','Supply','MasterData','Warehouse')
			WHERE [EQ].[ModelName] IS NULL
            FOR XML PATH (''), TYPE
        ).value('text()[1]','nvarchar(max)'), 2, 1000),'') AS 'Models'
SELECT GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time' AS 'TimeNow'
